data.comment: The match has started.
Paul Tierney signals a Man Utd throw-in in Everton's half.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Everton attack but Dominic Calvert-Lewin's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for Everton in Liverpool.
Corner awarded to Everton.
Everton to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
In the minute 12, Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton at Goodison Park.
Man Utd drive upfield and Bruno Fernandes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Everton defender.
In the minute 16, Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Anthony Martial of Man Utd gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
In the minute 17, Man Utd push forward at Goodison Park and Bruno Fernandes gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Everton defence.
Man Utd's Marcus Rashford gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Everton have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Paul Tierney awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Everton.
Goal! Everton have got their heads in front thanks to a Bernard strike.
In the minute 19, That's a fine assist from Dominic Calvert-Lewin.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 23, Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
Man Utd are pushing forward but Marcus Rashford's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Everton at Goodison Park.
In the minute 25, Goal! Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Liverpool.
Luke Shaw with an assist there.
Everton are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 28, Everton are on the attack at Goodison Park, where Lucas Digne is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
Goal kick for Man Utd at Goodison Park.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 30, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Man Utd.
Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes is on target but unsuccessful.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Bruno Fernandes.
In the minute 32, Marcus Rashford instrumental with a fine assist.
Everton have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Everton.
In the minute 34, Mason Holgate (Everton) gets a yellow card.
Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Everton's half?
Free kick Man Utd.
In the minute 37, Anthony Martial for Man Utd is whistled offside.
In Liverpool Everton's Dominic Calvert-Lewin is caught offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Man Utd in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Man Utd.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Liverpool.
In the minute 42, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Bruno Fernandes.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Bruno Fernandes for Man Utd is back on the field again.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Man Utdâ€™s Anthony Martial is on his feet again at Goodison Park.
In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Everton drive forward but James Rodriguez is judged offside.
In the minute 45, Paul Tierney signals a Man Utd throw-in in Everton's half.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Man Utd.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Goodison Park.
In the minute 45, Anthony Martial is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Allan for Everton has been booked by Paul Tierney and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway in Liverpool.
Abdoulaye Doucoure (Everton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 46, In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 48, Free kick Everton.
Man Utd have a goal kick.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) has received a yellow card from Paul Tierney.
Paul Tierney signals a throw-in for Everton, close to Man Utd's area.
Throw-in Man Utd.
In the minute 51, Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
In the minute 53, James Rodriguez (Everton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Everton in the half of Man Utd.
Everton to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
In the minute 56, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Everton.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Free kick Man Utd.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
Harry Maguire for Man Utd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 61, Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dominic Calvert-Lewin for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 63, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lucas Digne for Everton who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Lucas Digne returns to the field for Everton after picking up a slight injury.
Paul Tierney signals a Man Utd throw-in in Everton's half.
In the minute 65, In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Everton in the half of Man Utd.
Carlo Ancelotti is making the team's first substitution at Goodison Park with Alex Iwobi replacing Gylfi Sigurdsson.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer (Man Utd) is making a first substitution, with Axel Tuanzebe replacing Luke Shaw.
In the minute 68, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Man Utd.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 70, Man Utd needs to be cautious. Everton have an attacking throw-in.
Paul Tierney signals a Man Utd throw-in in Everton's half.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
In the minute 72, Man Utd drives forward and Marcus Rashford gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Everton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man Utd's half?
Paul Tierney awards Everton a goal kick.
In the minute 74, In Liverpool, Juan Mata of Man Utd is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Everton.
Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 76, Everton are coming forward and Bernard gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Man Utd at Goodison Park.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Man Utd have a goal kick.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 80, Everton have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Cenk Tosun is replacing James Rodriguez for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
The away team have replaced Juan Mata with Paul Pogba. This is the second substitution made today by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 82, Edinson Cavani is replacing Anthony Martial for Man Utd at Goodison Park.
In the minute 83, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Everton just outside Man Utd's area.
Fred (Man Utd) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Paul Tierney awards Man Utd a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Everton's Cenk Tosun has been booked in Liverpool.
In the minute 87, In Liverpool a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Man Utd in the half of Everton.
At Goodison Park, Abdoulaye Doucoure has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 89, Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes breaks free at Goodison Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Liverpool.
Marcus Rashford of Man Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
At Goodison Park the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Liverpool Everton attack through Abdoulaye Doucoure. The finish is off target, however.
Paul Tierney awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Man Utd.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Man Utd's Marcus Rashford looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Important block from the Man Utd defence as Abdoulaye Doucoure fires in a strike for Everton.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
Marcus Rashford is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
It's now 1-3 in Liverpool as Edinson Cavani scores for Man Utd.
Bruno Fernandes with an assist there.
